body.p:
Lancaster Ky March 7th 1864
To His Excellency Governor Thos E. Bramlette:

I send you a copy of the indictment agt James H. Smith and the warrant for his arrest. Mr Robert Harrison of Chillicothie Missouri is the man I want commissioned as this states agent to receive and bring Smtih to this state. I want you to offer a reward of $500. if you can consestently if you cannot offer that amount you will please say to Mr Harrison in your letter to him that I will pay him the difference between your offer and the $500. Please forward the requisition immediately as I deem it important to secure Smith arrest.

P.S.
Ask the editor of the Commonwealth not to publish the reward for two weeks from the time you start requisition

Missouri
Requisition for Jaso H. Smith

Order that a reward of $300 ifbe offered
send coms as directed & with the offer of Mr Burdett.
